<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_install_base.InstallBaseProductModelImpl</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>An Implementation class to get details of all the product models associated with the install base and the sold product based on input context.</description> <name>InstallBaseProductModelImpl</name> <script><![CDATA[var InstallBaseProductModelImpl = Class.create(); InstallBaseProductModelImpl.prototype = { initialize: function() { this.installBaseProductModelDao = new InstallBaseProductModelDao(); },
getProductModels: function(context,searchTerm,count,isSimpleResponce) { return this.installBaseProductModelDao.getProductModels(context,searchTerm,count,isSimpleResponce); },
type: 'InstallBaseProductModelImpl' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-08-18 07:10:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2c3af0cbd4d11910f8777df2f2ae05f1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>InstallBaseProductModelImpl</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Install Base Management" source="sn_install_base">7f1fc05477122300d7159b71a91061b7</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service Install Base Management">7f1fc05477122300d7159b71a91061b7</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c3af0cbd4d11910f8777df2f2ae05f1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-01-27 11:09:16</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
